author: Jacob Briars
description: Considering it's blue, "I quite like it" was the general consensus when we first tried this infamous cocktail. It tastes great when presented with a Jacob Briars' smile accompanied by his booming voice declaring, "I believe you ordered a blue drink."
name: Corpse Reviver No.Blue
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
